Posts.Content: longislandmom wrote: I am almost 2.5 weeks out from a BMX w/ TE. I just got my drains out yesterday, after 16 days, so i haven't been able to do any wall crawls.  I am a little freaked out by how tight my left arm is.  I really can't raise it and it is much worse than my right arm.  The PS says that if i can't lift both above my head w/in 6 weeks i should start PT.  I'm wondering if I should start sooner.  I'm interested in people's experiences with regaining arm range of motion and how long it took. and whether you went to PT immediatly? thanks!
